class FoodListButton(ListItemButton):
        pass

class Res_Page(Screen):
    total_food_bill = 0
    food_input2 = ObjectProperty()
    food_list_view = ObjectProperty()
def __init__(self, **kwargs):
    super(Res_Page, self).__init__(**kwargs)
    self.boxp = BoxLayout(orientation='vertical')
    self.labs = Label(text=" ")
    self.boxp.add_widget(self.labs)
    self.box = BoxLayout()
    self.box.orientation = 'horizontal'
    btn5 = Button(text="OK", size_hint=(0.5, 0.5), on_release=self.ok_button_hit)

    self.box.add_widget(btn5)
    self.boxp.add_widget(self.box)
    self.popup1 = Popup(title="Food Bill",
                        content=self.boxp,
                        size=(200, 200),
                        size_hint=(0.3, 0.3),
                        auto_dismiss=False)
    self.popup2 = Popup(title="Error",
                        content=Label(text='''Sorry we don't make that'''),
                        size=(200, 200),
                        size_hint=(0.3, 0.3),
                        auto_dismiss=True)

def ok_button_hit(self, instance):
    self.popup1.dismiss()
    self.manager.current = 'Title 2'

def submit_food(self):
    food_name = self.food_input2.text
    if (True):
        self.food_list_view.adapter.data.extend([food_name])
        self.food_list_view._trigger_reset_populate()
    else:
        self.popup2.open()

def delete_food(self, *args):

    if self.food_list_view.adapter.selection:
        selection = self.food_list_view.adapter.selection[0].text
        if (True):
            self.food_list_view.adapter.data.remove(selection)
            self.food_list_view._trigger_reset_populate()
        else:
            self.popup2.open()

def bill_food(self):
    self.labs.text = str(self.total_food_bill)
    self.popup1.open()
	
<Res_Page>:
    name: 'Title 4'
    orientation: "vertical"
    food_input2: food_name
    food_list_view: food_list
    padding: 10
    spacing: 10

    BoxLayout:
        size_hint_y: None
        #height: "40dp"

        Label:
            text: "Dish"
            size_hint_x: 0.4
            size_hint_y: 0
            size: [200, 50]
            pos_hint: {'top': 1, 'center_y': 0.5}
        TextInput:
            id: food_name
            multiline: False
            size_hint_x: 0.4
            size_hint_y: 0
            size: [400, 75]
            pos_hint: {'top': 1, 'center_y': 0.5}



    BoxLayout:

        size_hint_y: None
        height: "40dp"


        Button:
            text: "Submit"
            size_hint_x: 15
            on_release: root.submit_food()
        Button:
            text: "Delete"
            size_hint_x: 15
            on_release: root.delete_food()
        Button:
            text: "Generate Bill"
            size_hint_x: 15
            on_release: root.bill_food()

    ListView:
        id: food_list
        adapter:
            ListAdapter(data=["Complimentary drinks"], cls=main.FoodListButton)
